snippet.title: NeuroSquad Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the demo on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2017040/NeuroSquad__Slay_the_Horde

NeuroSquad is a "Bullet Heaven" Roguelike where you can combine any weapon with any upgrade. Assemble a squad and build up their attacks modularly! Redesign your weapons and embrace game-breaking synergies!

Genre: #Roguelike / #BulletHeaven / Horde survivor / Survivors-like / Shoot 'Em Up / Bullet Hell. 
Inspired by: Awesome games like 20 Minutes Till Dawn / Halls Of Torment / Vampire Survivors / Soulstone Survivors / Brotato / Risk of Rain 2.

#NeuroSquad #MattNemori
